biotools.summary:
Collecting and managing taxonomic data with NCBI-taxonomist.

ncbi-taxonomist handles and manages phylogenetic data from NCBI. Its primary use is to use taxonomic data to find and link related metadata from other Entrez databases, e.g. fetching data for metagenomic data-sets for specific or diverse group of org.

Toolbox to manage NCBI taxonomical data.
